Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Kenton
ShortDescription: EB 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Cicero, Harrison, Kostner and Jackson due to, street blockage near Jackson/Kenton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Cicero, Harrison, Kostner and Jackson due to, street blockage near Jackson/Kenton.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Thorndale and Fullerton
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Thorndale and Fullerton due to police activity at Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Thorndale and Fullerton due to police activity at Belmont.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Howard and Thorndale and,
  • between Fullerton and 95th, only.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Belmont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Belmont.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
